name: Frenzied Kitty
description:
STORY

You are a frenzied kitty trying to keep the never ending flow of hungry kitty kids with well chicken fried.

As if that's not enough work for one bartender, try covering four different bars with a different crazy crowd in each bar.

Keep the cute kitty kids coming, but be careful. You'd better be sure to feed as much as possible these little cute. Keep your eyes open to not let them to close of the fence they could hurt himelf.

  • Fast paced game
  • Cute pastel retro environment
  • Difficulty increasing
HOW TO RUN THE GAME
  1. Insert the game cartridge while the power is OFF
  2. Turn the power ON and you'll hear the Frenzied Kitty theme music as the first game screen appears.
  3. You have the option of choosing "START" or "QUIT" which is definitely not recommended 😆
CONTROLS

Arrow UP & Arrow Down for switching on different side.

Press "X" to throw chicken fried.

Press "F" to Fullscreen.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME

Frenzied Kitty consist of only one game screen. The score of the player is displayed in white at the upper left corner of the screen. The number of lives that player has remaining is indicated by up to five chicken fried (one for each life) at the opposite of the player score. Each time a player miss to feed kitty kids with a chicken fried your total amount of lives is substracted by 1. Each time a player can't feed kitty kids on time the cute kitty kid will hit the fence and the total amount of player lives will be deducted by one.

When the player reach a certain amount of score a little sound of success will be launched and the speed of kitty kids will be increased.

CREDITS

Developed by GdevSquad support me on twitter @GdevSquad

  • Assets & Art Cup Nooble
  • Music Swngyill YOON
  • SFX JFXR
  • Fonts Digital Disco
